title: SceneMediaLevelConfig
description: The level of a media source object. An instance of a scene source level.

name.title: Name
name.description: If set, specifies the {level} pattern for this level. If not, the value will be the index of the level in the levels array.

url.title: URL
url.description: If set, overrides any computed URL by this one. If not, the URL will be computed from other values

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description:
The pattern to respect in case of a multi tiles media. Four parameters are authorized:
  • {face} is for the face, in case of a cubemap media
  • {level} is for the level of quality of the tile, in case of a multi resolution media
  • {x} if for the x coordinates of the tile
  • {y} if for the y coordinates of the tile

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the source. It will be used with the height and tile to compute the value of the {x} and {y} patterns.

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the source. It will be used with the width and tile to compute the value of the {x} and {y} patterns.

tile.title: Tile
tile.description: The size of a tile, which corresponds to the width and the height of a tile. It will be used with the width and height to compute the value of the {x} and {y} patterns.
